<h3 id="X31481">X(31481) = CENTROID OF CURVATURES OF THESE CIRCLES: {2nd LEMOINE, MOSES, NINE-POINTS}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; -(b^2-c^2)^2+2*S*a^2+2*(b^2+c^2)*a^2  :  :

<p>
X(31481) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 31411, 5062), (6, 10576, 7746)<br>
